title: Ulysses 25 writing app brings third-party font support for iOS devices, visual revamp, more
content:
Ulysses just got a new update with version 25. For iPhone and iPad users, the app brings the ability to choose fonts from third-party font apps, while the Mac app brings some visual changes.

more…

The post Ulysses 25 writing app brings third-party font support for iOS devices, visual revamp, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ulysses just got an update with version 25. For iPhone and iPad users, the app brings the ability to choose fonts from third-party font apps.
